leaf.name: pt_
leaf.title: Electron P_t
leaf.description: Transverse momentum of the electrons (GeV/c)

leaf.name: corrections_.ecalEnergy
leaf.title: Electron Energy
leaf.description: Energy of the electrons (GeV)

leaf.name: eta_
leaf.title: Electron Eta
leaf.description: Psudeorapidity of the electrons. eta = -ln[tan(theta/2)] where theta is the pitch angle (angle between the momentum vector and the z-axis)

leaf.name: phi_
leaf.title: Electron Phi
leaf.description: Phi (rotation angle in the X-Y plane) of the electrons (rad)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fX
leaf.title: Electron Vtx X
leaf.description: X Position where the electron appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fY
leaf.title: Electron Vtx Y
leaf.description: Y Position where the electron appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fZ
leaf.title: Electron Vtx Z
leaf.description: Z Position where the electron appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: pt_
leaf.title: Muon P_t
leaf.description: Transverse momentum of the muons (GeV/c)

leaf.name: eta_
leaf.title: Muon Eta
leaf.description: Psudeorapidity of the muons. eta = -ln[tan(theta/2)] where theta is the pitch angle (angle between the momentum vector and the z-axis)

leaf.name: phi_
leaf.title: Muon Phi
leaf.description: Phi (rotation angle in the X-Y plane) of the muons (rad)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fX
leaf.title: Muon Vtx X
leaf.description: X Position where the muon appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fY
leaf.title: Muon Vtx Y
leaf.description: Y Position where the muon appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fZ
leaf.title: Muon Vtx Z
leaf.description: Z Position where the muon appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: pt_
leaf.title: Photon P_t
leaf.description: Transverse momentum of the photons (GeV/c)

leaf.name: showerShapeBlock_.e3x3
leaf.title: Photon Energy
leaf.description: Energy of the photons (GeV)

leaf.name: eta_
leaf.title: Photon Eta
leaf.description: Psuedorapidity of the photons. eta = -ln[tan(theta/2)] where theta is the pitch angle (angle between the momentum vector and the z-axis)

leaf.name: phi_
leaf.title: Photon Phi
leaf.description: Phi (rotation angle in the X-Y plane) of the photons (rad)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fX
leaf.title: Photon Vtx X
leaf.description: X Position where the photon appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fY
leaf.title: Photon Vtx Y
leaf.description: Y Position where the photon appears to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: vertex_.fCoordinates.fZ
leaf.title: Photon Vtx Z
leaf.description: Z Position where the photon seems to have originated (cm)

leaf.name: mass_
leaf.title: DiElectron Mass
leaf.description: Invarient mass calculated from the two most energetic electrons in each event (GeV/c^2)

leaf.name: mass_
leaf.title: DiMuon Mass
leaf.description: Invarient mass calculated from the two most energetic muons in each event (GeV/c^2)
